ja512:7.1: Vehāyasaṃ → vehāsayaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed), gammamāgamma → kamamāgamma (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | saṃkammāgamma (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja512:9.1: Gaḷeyya → galeyya (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed), pitvā → pītvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja512:10.1: Yaṃ pitva → yaṃ ve pītvā (bj) | yaṃ pītvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja512:12.1: Yaṃ pitva → yaṃ ve pītvā (bj) | yaṃ pītvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja512:14.1: Yaṃ pitva → yaṃ ve pītvā (bj) | yaṃ pītvā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja512:18.3: Ucchedanī vittavataṃ → ucchedanī vittagataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ucchedanivittagataṃ (mr)
ja512:21.1: Yaṃ ve pivitvāna → yaṃ ve pitvāna (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yañce pītvāna (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja512:28.2: ghoravisamiva → ... visammiva (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | ... visaṃ iva (mr) | ... visāmiva (?)
